Text: Firm Capital Mortgage Investment Corp (TSE:FC) to Issue Monthly Dividend of $0.08 Tweet  Firm Capital Mortgage Investment Corp (TSE:FC) declared a monthly dividend on Friday, September 27th, TickerTech reports. Investors of record on Tuesday, October 15th will be given a dividend of 0.078 per share on Tuesday, October 15th. This represents a $0.94 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 6.71%.
